headline.main: U.N. Security Council to Hold Emergency Meeting on North Korea Launch
headline.print_headline: U.N. Security Council to Hold Emergency Meeting on North Korea Launch

docs.snippet: The United Nations Security Council will hold an emergency meeting on Sunday to discuss the North Korean rocket launch as requested by United States, Japan and South Korea, the U.N. press office said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations Security Council will hold an emergency meeting on Sunday to discuss the North Korean rocket launch as requested by United States, Japan and South Korea, the U.N. press office said.

headline.main: Japan Did Not Try to Shoot Down North Korean Rocket: NHK
headline.print_headline: Japan Did Not Try to Shoot Down North Korean Rocket: NHK

docs.snippet: Japan did not take action to shoot down a rocket launched by North Korea on Sunday, though it flew over Japan's southern Okinawa prefecture, public broadcaster NHK said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan did not take action to shoot down a rocket launched by North Korea on Sunday, though it flew over Japan's southern Okinawa prefecture, public broadcaster NHK said.

headline.main: Rams RB Gurley Wins Top Offensive Rookie Award
headline.print_headline: Rams RB Gurley Wins Top Offensive Rookie Award

docs.snippet: St. Louis Rams running back Todd Gurley, who came off knee surgery in college to rush for 1,106 yards, has won The Associated Press Offensive Rookie of the Year award....
docs.lead_paragraph: St. Louis Rams running back Todd Gurley, who came off knee surgery in college to rush for 1,106 yards, has won The Associated Press Offensive Rookie of the Year award.

headline.main: U.S. Calls for Holding North Korea to Account; Republicans Talk Tough
headline.print_headline: U.S. Calls for Holding North Korea to Account; Republicans Talk Tough

docs.snippet: The United States vowed on Saturday to take all necessary actions to defend itself and its allies following a North Korean rocket launch, and said it would seek “significant measures” in the U.N. Security Council to hold North Korea to...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States vowed on Saturday to take all necessary actions to defend itself and its allies following a North Korean rocket launch, and said it would seek “significant measures” in the U.N. Security Council to hold North Korea to account.

headline.main: Blakeney's 31 Points Leads LSU Past Miss. St., 88-77
headline.print_headline: Blakeney's 31 Points Leads LSU Past Miss. St., 88-77

docs.snippet: Antonio Blakeney scored a career-high 31 points, and LSU moved into sole possession of first place in the Southeastern Conference with an 88-77 victory over struggling Mississippi State on Saturday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Antonio Blakeney scored a career-high 31 points, and LSU moved into sole possession of first place in the Southeastern Conference with an 88-77 victory over struggling Mississippi State on Saturday night.

headline.main: Plekanec Helps Canadiens End Skid With 5-1 Win Over Oilers
headline.print_headline: Plekanec Helps Canadiens End Skid With 5-1 Win Over Oilers

docs.snippet: Tomas Plekanec had a goal and three assists, helping the Montreal Canadiens end a four-game losing streak with a 5-1 victory over the Edmonton Oilers on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tomas Plekanec had a goal and three assists, helping the Montreal Canadiens end a four-game losing streak with a 5-1 victory over the Edmonton Oilers on Saturday.

headline.main: Denver's Wade Phillips Wins Assistant Coach Award
headline.print_headline: Denver's Wade Phillips Wins Assistant Coach Award

headline.main: What 74 Years of Crossword History Says About the Language We Use

docs.snippet: The world may have become more globalized, but the venerable puzzle now relies less on international words and place names....

byline.original: By CHARLES KURZMAN and JOSH KATZ

docs.lead_paragraph: The world may have become more globalized, but the venerable puzzle now relies less on international words and place names.

headline.main: Lillard Scores 21 to Help Portland Beat Houston 96-79
headline.print_headline: Lillard Scores 21 to Help Portland Beat Houston 96-79

docs.snippet: Damian Lillard had 21 points and 10 assists to lead a balanced scoring attack and the Portland Trail Blazers built a big lead early and rolled to an easy 96-79 win over the Houston Rockets on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Damian Lillard had 21 points and 10 assists to lead a balanced scoring attack and the Portland Trail Blazers built a big lead early and rolled to an easy 96-79 win over the Houston Rockets on Saturday.
